#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	long int n;
	string str;
	long double a,f;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>str;
	cin>>a>>f;
	
	long int count = (long int)(f/a);
	//printf("%Lf %Lf %d\n",f,a,count);
	bool flag = true;
	long int count_L=0,count_R=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		if(str[i]=='L'){
			count_L++;
			if((count_L)>count){
				cout<<"NO\n";
				flag = false;
				break;
			}
			count_R=0;
		}
		else if(str[i]=='R'){
			count_R++;
			if((count_R)>count){
				cout<<"NO\n";
				flag = false;
				break;
			}
			count_L=0;
		}
	}
	if(flag)
		cout<<"YES\n";
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
